overview: In the Fall of 1940, the entire population of Friar, New Hampshire walked together up a winding mountain trail and into the wilderness. Without warning, they left behind everything: their homes, their clothes, and their money. The only clue where they went was a single word etched into stone near the forestâ€™s edge: YELLOWBRICKROAD.
tagline: They went looking for evil in the forest but the forest found evil in them
title: YellowBrickRoad
